title: Amelia Hamlin, 18, gets a kiss from her beau Mercer Wiederhorn during loved-up outing in LA
text:
Amelia Hamlin, the daughter of Real Housewife Of Beverly Hills Lisa Rinna, was seen with her beau Mercer Widerhorn in Los Angeles on Wednesday.

The 18-year-old got a kiss on the cheek from her boyfriend as they hugged on a sunlit sidewalk outside a stylish restaurant.

She slipped into a pair of monochrome Alexander Wang sweats with a white crop top, while he bundled up in a colorful Warren Lotas hoodie.

On the go: Amelia Hamlin, the daughter of Real Housewife Of Beverly Hills Lisa Rinna, was seen with her beau Mercer Widerhorn in Los Angeles on Wednesday

Amelia and her 21-year-old sister Delilah are Lisa's daughters by her fellow TV star and husband of more than two decades Harry Hamlin.

Meanwhile, Amelia's boyfriend happens to be related to Lisa's former Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills co-star Kim Richards.

Mercer's elder brother Thayer Wiederhorn is married to Kim's daughter Brooke, with whom he shares sons Hucksley, two, and Hunter, four months.

Lisa and Kim famously had a turbulent relationship on The Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills before the latter left the show after 2017.

On one 2015 episode, Kim intimated she would expose Lisa's 'situation at home,' and Lisa flung a drink at Kim before smashing the glass against the table.

Mercer and Amelia appear to have been an item since at least April, when she posted a photo of them getting cozy at the Coachella Music Festival.

Both Delilah and Amelia have gone into modeling, and the family have been open about the latter's experience with anorexia.

'The scariest thing about anorexia is, is she going to have this forever?' Lisa shared on The Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills.

'You know, you just want to take your child out of pain. You don’t want your child to be in pain,' she said, acknowledging: 'You can't help but blame yourself.'
